sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { string, number, any } from "prop-types" import Button from "../../Shared/Button" import "./ProjectCard.scss" const ProjectCard = ({ id, title, subtitle, paragraph, buttonLabel, image, }) => { const projectId = `project-${id}` const subtitleId = `subtitle-${id}` const buttonId = `btn-${id}` const buttonAriaLabelledBy = `${projectId} ${buttonId}` return (
{/* eslint-disable-next-line global-require,import/no-dynamic-require */}

{title}

{subtitle}

{paragraph}

) } ProjectCard.displayName = "Project Card" ProjectCard.propTypes = { id: number.isRequired, title: string.isRequired, subtitle: string, paragraph: string.isRequired, buttonLabel: string, image: any, } export default ProjectCard
